s1.title: Introduction
s1.p: This is the Excalibur Event package which includes event queues, asynchronous command processing, and the interfaces to support event based programming. Fortress uses this project to manage the components and its pools outside of the direct thread of execution. It has been tested, and only a couple of clean up things need to be done to make this an officially released package.
